review: After a rocky start I am happy to report my love for Google Chromecast grows with each free movie stream. As I said, a rough start. The constant interruptions with the "loading" message was maddening. I racked my brain and burned up the Internet searching  for an answer. Just as I was ready to give up all hope a moment of clarity....is it my WIFI signal that's the problem?  Ordered the Cysco plug-in Wifi extender and voila, almost perfect streaming. I took a chance and it paid off. My only gripe is the lack of compatibility with Amazon Prime Instant movies. Why Amazon why? If this flaw was fixed it would be an almost perfect love.

review: After an hour of this chromecast not connecting I felt compelled to write a review. We have the amazon fire stick and the chromecast.  We use the fire stick mostly because of the remote and not having to use a device to get things going. We recently bought a tv for the basement and I put the chromecast down there since we use it less. It worked for 22 minutes and then 2ouldnt connect again for over an hour. I'm throwing it in the trash and have another fire stick being mailed as I type. We've had intermittent issues with it in the past but this time was so frustrating I'm done. Done. Done.
